response.original_title: THE CORRECT METHOD OF LOVE IS NOT IN A BOOK OR BLUEPRINT
response.overview: A librarian bookworm is cozy and at home with her books. Parties, love, and men do not have a home in her world. She meets a man one day who is quite unlike her-talkative, rambunctious and outgoing. Could her new acquaintance change her?
response.title: THE CORRECT METHOD OF LOVE IS NOT IN A BOOK OR BLUEPRINT
